title: in the case of any other local authority, Special Planning Authority, New Town Development Authority
clause_text: in the case of any other local authority, Special Planning Authority, New Town Development Authority or Area Development Authority, the Chief Executive Officer or person exercising such powers under Acts applicable to such authorities; in the area of a Regional Plan, the Collector of the District;

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
